import React from 'react'; import Button from './Button'; import Divider from './Divider'; import Dropbox from './Dropbox'; import { Play, Stop, ShareFat, Download, UsersFour, CodeBlock, CaretDown } from './Icon'; import '../index.css'; import { ThemeDropdown } from './ThemeDropdown'; function Header() { const [theme, setTheme] = useState("cobalt"); const options = [ { label: 'Option 1', onClick: () => alert('Option 1 clicked') }, { label: 'Option 2', onClick: () => alert('Option 2 clicked') }, { label: 'Option 3', onClick: () => alert('Option 3 clicked') }, ]; return (

Online code editor

} altText="Language Actions" bgColor="border" textColor="text-primary-primary500" options={options} />
{/*
} altText="Theme Actions" bgColor="border" textColor="text-primary-primary500" options={options} />
*/}
); } export default Header;
